themes: tiered grant allocation by budget size
grant limits tied to organizational budgets
key_phrases: Allow all non-profits to apply for city funding
Limit grant amounts to a percentage of budget size--not over 25%
barriers_identified: inequitable competition between organizations of different sizes
solutions_proposed: Allow all non-profits to apply for city funding
Separate groups by budget size so different sized organizations can apply for different amounts of money
Limit grant amounts to a percentage of budget size--not over 25%
